translation.en: The future of artificial intelligence, and it all started with this.
translation.it: Il futuro dell'intelligenza artificiale, inizia qui.

translation.en: [Mr. Short] Ah, Alfred. Hmm.
Hang on. Innovation, seven?
For the King Croc sub aqua drone? I mean,
this thing completely changed the face of deep-sea rescue.
translation.it: Ha rivoluzionato i soccorsi in mare.

translation.en: There's some frankly offensive inaccuracies.
They should let us write the stats.
That'd be so cool, and way more accurate.
Nas, I heard a little rumor going around the message boards that--
translation.it: Nas, ho sentito dire sul forum che…

translation.en: Well, hear me out. Whatever he's launching, today, right,
is gonna make every single one of these obsolete.
We're talking straight tens.
It's just gossip. I know you don't like to listen to that…
translation.it: Sono pettegolezzi. Non li ami, ma…

translation.en: No, course not.
-But what if it's true? -Right.
I mean, after this trip, the world may never be the same again.
translation.it: Dopo questo viaggio, il mondo sarà diverso.

translation.en: Bus can't get here quick enough.
Literally. It's five minutes late.
-Intelligence, zero? That's ridiculous. -What?
Lucky for him, I've got the reflexes of a cat that can drive.
translation.it: Per fortuna ho i riflessi di un gatto.

translation.en: What's he doing out in the daytime? Something must be wrong.
translation.it: Cosa fa fuori di giorno? Deve avere qualcosa.

translation.en: Sophie, he's a spiky ball. Nothing's hurting him.
translation.it: È una palla di spine. Non ha nulla.

translation.en: Get him in the car.
-Sure you won't get in trubbs? -We've talked about "trubbs,"
translation.it: Non avrai guai? Niente guai, e poi merito fiducia con una frenata del genere.

translation.en: and I think I've earned a bit of credit with an emergency stop like that.
translation.it: Niente guai, e poi merito fiducia con una frenata del genere.

translation.en: Right, Jeff?
I think he's dehydrated. We need some water.
How can you tell? Not like he has a range of expressions.
translation.it: Come lo sai? Non ha espressioni.

translation.en: He literally has one, "I'm a hedgehog."
Misha, your lesson was only booked till 8, so I'd appreciate it--
translation.it: Misha, la lezione era solo fino alle 8, e…

translation.en: No backseat driving please, Jeff. I'm trying to concentrate.
translation.it: Non si parla al guidatore. Mi distrai.

translation.en: -The bus leaves at 8, right? -I think so?
translation.it: - Il bus parte alle 8? - Mi pare.

translation.en: Yeah. Loads of time.
[Sophie] Careful, you're scaring him.
I'm not scared.
-I find it a bit difficult to work-- -Not everything's about you, Jeff.
translation.it: - È difficile lavorare… - Non tutto ti riguarda, Jeff.

translation.en: We have three minutes to catch the bus.
We can either be careful or we can be quick.
-I vote careful. -I vote quick.
Overruled, Jeff.
[woman] Can't talk, babe.
No, I'm driving.
Yeah, he's got a science trip.
You know that fella with the robots?
translation.it: Sai quel tipo con i robot?

translation.en: Yeah, he's into all of that, apparently.
Oh, I know. Oh, it's tragic.
translation.it: Oh, lo so. Oh, è patetico.

translation.en: No, look I really can't talk.
Get out! She didn't!
Hi, Danny.
Hello, Tom's mom.
Daniel, I keep telling you, you can call me Julie.
translation.it: Daniel, ripeto che puoi chiamarmi Julie.

translation.en: -Hi, Julie. -So, off to look at some robots, are you?
translation.it: - Ciao, Julie. - Allora, andate a vedere i robot, vero?

translation.en: Yeah, it's a day off school, innit?
Well, you enjoy yourself.
-Don't do anything I wouldn't do. -All right.
translation.it: - Non fare niente che non farei. - Ok.

translation.en: Ha! See that?
Hey, Mom, see you later, yeah? Maybe after--
Hey.
-She's all right, your mom. -Yes, okay, man.
translation.it: - Tua mamma è in gamba. - Ok.

translation.en: Skelly, don't you think Tom's mom's all right?
translation.it: Skelly, la mamma di Tom non è in gamba?

translation.en: Yeah, she's more than all right, Tom.
translation.it: Sì, più che in gamba, Tom.

translation.en: Come on.
Grab it!
Pass it.
♪ That hat is mine I wear it all the time ♪
translation.it: Quel berretto è mio Lo indosso sempre

translation.en: ♪ You think that you're cool But you look like a fool, let's go! ♪
translation.it: Ti credi figa Ma sembri scema, andiamo!

translation.en: ♪ So, try it on I bet you look the bomb ♪
translation.it: Allora, provalo Ti starà alla grande

translation.en: ♪ If you make me late to class I'll stick this hat right up your-- ♪
translation.it: Se faccio tardi a lezione Te lo infilo in…

translation.en: Enough.
-Please go. It's far too early for improv. -[playful music plays]
-Love you, Daddy. -I love you, Bethan.
-Love you, Mr. Conner! -Get out of my van, Joshua.
Yo, wait up.
-So, I shall see you back here. -Ten o'clock on the dot.
translation.it: - Ci vediamo qui. - Dieci in punto.

translation.en: -Be on time… -You'll be fine.
-You'll do great… -If you're not late.
-Don't forget. -I love you, but all this rhyming is gonna throw off my schedule.
translation.it: - Ricordati. - Vado, o mi si sballano gli orari.

translation.en: -Have fun, darling. -Bye.
[laughs] Anti-gravity?
Cellular regeneration?
Nanotech? He's Dalton Monkhouse, what's he gonna do next?
translation.it: Nanotecnologia? È Dalton Monkhouse, cosa farà ora?

translation.en: Good morning, sir. How are we, today?
Honestly, Chelsea, not great.
Still on your brother-in-law's sofa?
The bus hasn't shown up yet.
Wait, hang on. How'd you know about that?
Hey there. I hope you're having a lovely morning.
translation.it: Salve. Una buona giornata a lei.

translation.en: I am, thank you.
Listen, I hate to be a pain, but I'm calling from Braelawn Academy.
translation.it: Mi scusi, chiamo dalla Braelawn Academy.

translation.en: Yeah. Not yet.
Okay. Just around the corner?
So, it'll only be 25 minutes late.
How old am I?
Old enough to know I'll be expecting a sizable discount on the invoice.
translation.it: Abbastanza da sapere che mi spetta uno sconto.

translation.en: You take care.
One minute late!
And that is basically early.
Cheers, Jeff. Reckon I'm ready for my test, yeah?
translation.it: Ciao, Jeff. Sono pronta per l'esame?

translation.en: [Mr. Short] Right, here they come.
Nice and slow, please. No, don't push.
Excuse me, can we please just get on the bus…
Steps do not compute.
Ow, my robo-shins.
Get on the bus, please, Josh.
Guys… Excuse me, guys.
Please be careful.
Make your way up to the left. If there's no space, go upstairs.
translation.it: Se non c'è spazio, andate di sopra.

translation.en: Kiss!
-I'm sorry, sir. -It's all right.
I'm not great with long journeys myself.
translation.it: Anch'io non amo i viaggi lunghi.

translation.en: Try and visualize an ocean, that's what I do.
translation.it: Io provo a visualizzare il mare.

translation.en: Just a calm ocean.
Oh no, that's--
Oh, dear.
Can I just borrow that a sec?
[Chelsea] Okay, guys.
Guys!
In order to stop you being bored,
I have curated and printed off some brochures for your perusal.
translation.it: ho curato e stampato degli opuscoli.

translation.en: No big deal, I was only up till 2.
translation.it: Sono rimasta sveglia fino alle due.

translation.en: You'll find a map of the Green Arena,
some fun trivia about Monkhouse Dynamics and the winning essay,
translation.it: curiosità sulla Monkhouse Dynamics e il saggio vincitore,

translation.en: handpicked by Dalton Monkhouse himself,
and the reason we get to attend such a prestigious event.
Round of applause for Nas.
So, Nas, you're a Dalton Monkhouse stan, is that fair to say?
translation.it: Nas, sei un fan della Dalton Monkhouse?

translation.en: That is fair to say, Chelsea. Yes.
What can you tell us about him?
-Here we go. -Tell me when it's over.
Okay, so Dalton Monkhouse is the founder of Monkhouse Dynamics.
translation.it: È il fondatore di Monkhouse Dynamics.

translation.en: He's a multi-billionaire, a renowned environmentalist, a designer and engineer of next gen robotics.
translation.it: È un miliardario, stimato ambientalista, e ingegnere robotico di nuova generazione.

translation.en: He's also the only three-time recipient of the International Science Award.
translation.it: Ha vinto tre volte il premio internazionale della scienza.

translation.en: He's basically the coolest guy on the planet.
translation.it: È il più figo del pianeta.

translation.en: It's all in the essay.
Gimme that.
"My name is Nas." "Read my love letter to Dr. Monkhouse in this handy brochure."
translation.it: "Mi chiamo Nas. Ecco la mia lettera d'amore a Monkhouse."

translation.en: Actually, it's not.
It's not a love letter, it's actually a thesis
on the intrinsically disordered tardigrade proteins
and their potential biostasis applications.
That sounds amazing.
Really? You should give it a read.
Don't worry. I tried to make it as accessible to the layperson as I could.
translation.it: Non temere. L'ho resa comprensibile ai profani.

translation.en: What did you call me?
Why don't you just leave him alone, Danny?
Everyone, listen up, yeah.
Misha's mate has got something to say.
translation.it: L'amica di Misha ha qualcosa da dire.

translation.en: Go on, Misha's mate.
Not the first time you couldn't get a girl to talk to you, eh? Daniel.
translation.it: Non è la prima volta che una ragazza non ti fila.

translation.en: How are things with Sarah?
Oh, yeah. That's right.
She dumped you.
She got tired of holding her nose.
Apparently, it's not only your personality that stinks.
translation.it: Non puzza solo la tua personalità.

translation.en: I got this for you.
Oh. You can keep that. I won't be needing it.
Which is, coincidentally, exactly what Sarah said about you.
translation.it: Che è esattamente quello che Sarah ha detto di te.

translation.en: Start on her again
and I'll say way worse.
Okay, that's enough. Everyone settle down.
We'll be there in a minute. Stop throwing.
-Mate, don't even worry about it, she's-- -Shut up.
Where's that bra gone?
[Misha] Forget about him. -What'll we do about--? -Spikelangelo?
Oh, no, you named him.
We've got a baby to look after now.
-And you love him. -I wouldn't go that far.
-Give him a kiss. -Oh, no. Hey!
-Yeah, he's not in there. -What?
Oh, my gosh. I'm a terrible parent.
Okay, just wait. Because we're running a little bit late…
translation.it: Ok, aspettate. Siccome siamo un po' in ritardo…

translation.en: I know. For the last leg of our journey, we're gonna be traveling in style.
translation.it: Lo so. Per l'ultima parte del tragitto, viaggeremo con stile.

translation.en: No offense.
So everyone off!
One at a time. Off you get. Slowly.
Yeah, one at a time. Don't… Yes. Give me some…
translation.it: Sì, uno alla volta. Non… Sì.

translation.en: Elbow in the face. Thank you.
Yes!
Found my lunch.
I'm sorry if there's some sick on the seat.
translation.it: Mi dispiace per il vomito sul sedile.

translation.en: How about that?
What do you think, Tom?
-It's all right, sir. -Yeah.
Danny? What do you think of that?
Did you know… Excuse me!
…Dalton Monkhouse built his first domestic robot when he was only nine years old?
translation.it: Dalton Monkhouse ha costruito il suo primo robot a soli nove anni.

translation.en: -Anyone tell me what it was called? -Alfred!
Nice one, Nas.
Okay, what about the robot called Percy? What did that one do?
translation.it: Ok, e il robot di nome Percy? Cosa faceva?

translation.en: It was a gardener! To help his mom plant the daffodils.
translation.it: Giardiniere! Aiutava la madre a piantare.

translation.en: Well done again, Nas. Maybe let someone else have a go. Just…
give people a chance. Okay, what about this one?
translation.it: Da' loro una possibilità. E questa?

translation.en: What did Monkhouse call his revolutionary AI network
translation.it: Come ha chiamato Monkhouse la rete IA

translation.en: that allowed 75 drones
to perform a synchronized light show at this year's Green Live concert?
translation.it: in uno spettacolo di luci al Green Live, quest'anno?

translation.en: -Family-- -No, sorry, Nas. Anyone else?
Kin Chip.
He called it the Kin Chip Network.
Get Tom doing the reading.
Right you are, mate. Can I get a bump?
I was gonna say Kin Chip. I was gonna say that.
It's okay not to know everything, champ. Nobody does.
translation.it: È normale, campione. Nessuno sa tutto.

translation.en: Hi, I'm Dalton Monkhouse.
Welcome to the Green Arena and welcome to the future!
translation.it: Benvenuti alla Green Arena e benvenuti nel futuro!

translation.en: Hand your phones in. You'll get them back after the presentation.
translation.it: Consegnate i telefoni. Li riavrete poi.

translation.en: [Monkhouse hologram] I'm Dalton Monkhouse.
Welcome to the Green Arena and welcome to the future!
translation.it: Benvenuti alla Green Arena e benvenuti nel futuro!

translation.en: So Nas doesn't know everything.
Least I know more than you.
Don't know more than Tom, though, do you?
translation.it: Non ne sai più di Tom, vero?

translation.en: Yeah, I do.
You hear that, Tom? Gonna let him chat like that about you?
translation.it: Hai sentito, Tom? Ti fai trattare così?

translation.en: -I'm not bothered, mate. -No.
I wouldn't have that, you know?
You can't let him do that. You've gotta do something.
You can't let him do that, bro.
Hey, that's my stuff!
Watch your mouth, yeah?
Pro tip from someone who's been there.
Not everyone shares your enthusiasm for this stuff.
translation.it: Non tutti sono entusiasti come te.

translation.en: -So, maybe dial it down a bit. -Dial "it" down?
What's "it"?
You know, your interests and passions.
translation.it: I tuoi interessi e le tue passioni.

translation.en: The things that make me me?
Kind of?
"Sophie Roman. Sisterly advice, zero."
-Hey, Mom told me to look out for you. -I don't need looking out for!
translation.it: - La mamma vuole che badi a te. - Non ne ho bisogno!

translation.en: How'd that go? Good? 'Cause we've got a hedgehog to liberate.
translation.it: È andata bene? Liberiamo il riccio.

translation.en: [Monkhouse hologram] Hi, I'm Dalton Monkhouse.
Welcome to the Green Arena and welcome to the future!
translation.it: Benvenuti alla Green Arena e benvenuti nel futuro!

translation.en: This is only the beginning.
Tomorrow will be better, believe me.
-He's gonna get himself in trubbs. -Please stop saying "trubbs."
translation.it: - Finirà nei guai. - Smettila con i guai.

translation.en: New plan. You get Nas, I'll take care of Spikelangelo.
translation.it: Tu prendi Nas, io mi occupo di Spikelangelo.

translation.en: [whispering] Nas?
Careful out there.
I swear, if you give me fleas, I will punt you over that hedge.
translation.it: Se mi attacchi le pulci, ti lancio oltre la siepe.

translation.en: Enjoy paradise, son.
You lost one?
-He lost one. -Technically, it lost itself.
translation.it: - L'ha persa lui. - Si è persa.

translation.en: -You dropped it on the floor-- -Would you shut… Just shut up.
[stage manager] Two minutes. All stage crews to positions.
Just… get to positions.
We are not messing up the life's work of Dalton Monkhouse while the world is watching, okay?
translation.it: Non rovineremo l'opera di Dalton Monkhouse davanti al mondo.

translation.en: [stage manager] One minute, everyone. Heroes on stage.
Last looks, see you on the other side.
[whispering] Nas?
[event narrator] The world can be a dark place,
translation.it: Il mondo è un luogo oscuro,

translation.en: but one man can bring the light.
translation.it: ma un uomo può portare la luce.

translation.en: That man's name is
Dalton Monkhouse.
Thank you.
Thank… No, thank you.
Thank you. Thank you very much.
And I am so sorry that I cannot be there with you in person today,
translation.it: E mi dispiace tanto di non poter essere lì di persona,

translation.en: but I am with you all in digital spirit.
translation.it: ma sono con voi nello spirito digitale.

translation.en: That's right, thanks to Monkhouse Dynamics' Holo-sapiens technology,
translation.it: Esatto, grazie alla tecnologia Holo-Sapiens di Monkhouse Dynamics,

translation.en: I have finally achieved omnipresence.
Hello, Rio.
Hello, Tokyo.
Hello, Mumbai.
Hello, humanity.
And hello, planet Earth.
Beautiful, isn't she?
Well,
take a good look, because it might be your last.
translation.it: guardatela bene, perché potrebbe essere l'ultima volta.

translation.en: What?
The world is doomed?
But we all use paper straws instead of plastic in our milkshakes now.
translation.it: Ma ora usiamo cannucce di carta anziché di plastica nei nostri milkshake.

translation.en: Is that not enough?
Ah. Stop it! Pay attention.
Watching you. Watch the presentation, please!
translation.it: Vi tengo d'occhio. Guardate la presentazione!

translation.en: You know, I've gotta say that after 20 years
of cleaning plastic out of the ocean, fertilizing arid land,
translation.it: di bonifica dei mari dalla plastica, fertilizzare le terre aride,

translation.en: repopulating endangered species…
translation.it: ripopolare specie in via di estinzione…

translation.en: You're welcome, by the way.
…I had a revelation.
Pollution.
Deforestation.
Hunting species to extinction.
So, who does all of that?
You do.
That's right.
You people can't solve the planet's problem
translation.it: Voi non potete risolvere il problema del pianeta

translation.en: because the planet's problem is people.
translation.it: perché il problema sono le persone.

translation.en: So, whose fault is it, really,
translation.it: Allora, di chi è davvero la colpa

translation.en: that the world is on the brink of destruction?
translation.it: se il mondo è sull'orlo della distruzione?

translation.en: It's my fault.
I expected too much of you.
I mean, you're only human.
You've done all you can. You really have.
translation.it: Avete fatto tutto il possibile. Davvero.

translation.en: But I haven't.
So I started thinking.
If I had a magic lamp, what would I wish for?
translation.it: Se avessi una lampada magica, cosa desidererei?

translation.en: Well, clean up the environment,
end climate change,
bring about world peace?
No, come on.
No, there's no way
that you can achieve all of that in one fell swoop.
translation.it: ottenere tutto quello in un colpo solo.

translation.en: Is there?
Well, there wasn't.
Until now.
Friends, humans, Earth people,
I give you the Monkhouse Dynamics Genie Orb!
translation.it: ecco a voi il Globo geniale della Monkhouse Dynamics!

translation.en: Here they come.
Little cheeky.
"Why genie?" I hear you ask.
Well, because our wish is their command.
translation.it: Beh, perché un nostro desiderio è un loro ordine.

translation.en: You want to put a stop to climate change? Done.
translation.it: Volete porre fine al cambiamento climatico? Fatto.

translation.en: You want to clean up the planet? No problem.
translation.it: Volete ripulire il pianeta? Nessun problema.

translation.en: You want to bring about world peace?
translation.it: Volete portare la pace nel mondo?

translation.en: Oh, go on then.
Now, I know what you're all thinking.
"How could these little things do all of that, Dalton?"
translation.it: "Come possono queste cosine fare tutto ciò, Dalton?"

translation.en: And the answer is, with your help.
translation.it: E la risposta è: con il vostro aiuto.

translation.en: Now, I need you to do something for me, okay?
translation.it: Ho bisogno che facciate una cosa per me.

translation.en: All I need you to do is just…
translation.it: Tutto quello che dovete fare è…

translation.en: look into the light.
That's it.
Can you feel it?
Can you feel it?
Just let it in.
Let it wash over you.
That warm, healing glow. Just let it in.
translation.it: Quel caldo bagliore curativo. Fatelo entrare.

translation.en: Just look into the light.
That's it.
What was that?
That was you interrupting what might have been the first meaningful contact
translation.it: Hai interrotto quello che poteva essere il primo contatto

translation.en: between man and machine.
Oh. Sorry.
It was incredible.
Like it was reaching out to me somehow.
translation.it: Come se volesse stabilire un legame.

translation.en: A connection.
[Monkhouse hologram] Hear the sound of my voice.
translation.it: Ascoltate il suono della mia voce.

translation.en: Just look into the light.
Trust me,
and believe me when I say
that I am sending you all
to a better place.
